# Mage Armor, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Creation Spells|creation]]) \[[[Force Spells|force]]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 hour/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 136

*An invisible sheen of armor-shaped force surrounds you.*

This spell functions like *[[Mage Armor (Spell)|mage armor]]*, except that it requires no material component and its tangible field of force provides a +6 armor bonus to Armor Class.
